At the beginning of combat on your turn, arm target creature you control. Then if it's equipped twice, it gains indestructible until end of turn. [i](Create a colorless Equipment artifact token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {2} attached to it.)[/i]
Whenever Amelia attacks, she deals damage to any target equal to the number of Equipments attached to attacking creatures you control. You gain that much life.
